name: Space Pursuit
description:
Space Pursuit

Chase down the aliens, then become chased by a space boulder?

Modification 1: Change in name of the game, menus.

Modification 2: Additional levels to complete a total of 3 levels, all levels are distinct in feel and gameplay.

Modification 3: Added Power-Ups(more bullet, faster rate of fire, livesUP ), Health counting UI.

Created by:

Matyas Dudas
